Section.Catchline: Rights and duties of certain secondary obligors.

Subsection.Text: A secondary obligor acquires the rights and becomes obligated to perform the duties of the secured party after the secondary obligor:

Paragraph.Text: Receives an assignment of a secured obligation from the secured party;
Receives a transfer of collateral from the secured party and agrees to accept the rights and assume the duties of the secured party; or
Is subrogated to the rights of a secured party with respect to collateral.

Subsection.Text: An assignment, transfer, or subrogation described in subsection (1):

Paragraph.Text: Is not a disposition of collateral under s. 679.610; and
Relieves the secured party of further duties under this chapter.
